text.text: Massive native silver grades up to 89,853 g/t (2,621 oz/ton) intersected during surface drilling at the Castle East Robinson Zone less than 2 km east of the Castle Mine shafts.
The Company published the regionâ€™s first 43-101 resource estimate with a total of 7.56 million ounces of silver in inferred resources.
